description: A concise dashboard to monitor metrics collected by Deis Monitor.

targets.query: SELECT last("fs_used_bytes") / last("fs_capacity_bytes") * 100 FROM "kubernetes_node" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("cpu_usage_nanocores")  / 1000000000 FROM "kubernetes_node" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_usage_nanocores")  / 1000000000 FROM "kubernetes_pod_container" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "namespace" =~ /^$Namespace$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "namespace" fill(null)

list.name: Node
list.query: show tag values from kubernetes_pod_container with key=host

list.name: Namespace
list.query: show tag values from "kubernetes_pod_container" with key="namespace" where host =~ /^$Node$/

title: Kubernetes Overall Health
